column4: can anyone point me to a post or answer for the proper procedure for "ejecting" a usb flash drive
easiest way is to click on the icon on your desktop showing your flash drive, then hit eject

that option is not available, I have unmount.  Will that do the trick?? Only question i'm asking is because when I eject the hardware within windwos the light on it goes out, when I unmount it in *Nix the light stays on, hasn't created any problems just curios.
